attributes.action: Provide Front-Line Key Workers in NHS & Social Care 14 Days extra Paid Leave
attributes.additional_details:
They were our families when we could not be with our own. They showed us true dedication in the time of our Nations need during this emergency.

They held our family’s hands when we could not hold them ourselves. They dried the tears of those who suffered in isolation when we could not dry them for ourselves.

Yet, through all their hard work, long hours and dedication they sacrificed seeing their family and risked infection themselves, so that we could eventually be reunited with our family.
attributes.background: Key Workers Appreciation Petition. They Care Now, we now need to show how much we care. Our aim is to support & secure Government funding that will allow all Front-Line Key Workers in NHS & Social Care to have a Paid Holiday to recover from the stresses of working through the Covid19 emergency

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
